Table.Name: WebServices
Table.Command: select w.id, Type, Url, CheckUrl, TimeCheck from WebServices w join Services s on w.id = s.id
delete from WebServices where Id = @Id delete from Services where Id = @Id

begin tran if exists (select * from Services where Id = @Id) begin update Services set TimeCheck = @TimeCheck where Id = @Id update WebServices set CheckUrl = @CheckUrl where Id = @Id end else begin insert into Services values (@Id, 'WebService', @Url, @TimeCheck) insert into WebServices values (@Id, @CheckUrl) end commit tran

Table.Name: Denials
Table.Command: select Id, ServiceId, StartWorking, Time from Denials
begin tran insert into Denials values (@Id, @ServiceId, @StartWorking, @Time) commit tran
